item.title: What did US get from deals to pause tariffs on Canada and Mexico? Not that much, observers say
item.description: President Donald Trump’s threatened tariffs against Canada and Mexico risked blowing up North America’s economy.

item.title: ACLU sues over Trump shutting down asylum access at the southern border
Recovery work resumes at the site of the deadly plane and chopper collision near Washington
